apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this loving couple emoji showcases a person and a woman, depicted with medium-light and medium-dark skin tones respectively, united by a glowing heart. The heart, rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft highlights, exudes warmth and affection. The smooth, naturalistic rendering of the individuals and the overall gentle, rounded aesthetic on Apple devices emphasize connection, partnership, and the joy of shared love.
